ref: 4127 gādhá n. ʻ ford ʼ RV., adj. ʻ shallow ʼ KauṣBr. [cf. gāˊdhatē ʻ stands firm ʼ Dhātup., Pa. gādhati. -- √gādh]
Pa. gādha -- ʻ fordable ʼ, n. ʻ ford ʼ;
Pk. gādha -- ʻ shallow ʼ, gāha -- m. ʻ ford ʼ;
Sh. ga m. ʻ small mountain stream (T.
G. Bailey), large nullah (Lorimer) ʼ, vai -- gā m.f. ʻ ford, stream ʼ. In meaning ʻ valley, stream ʼ perh. < gāhá -- .
